item.title: python-youtube: Retrieving multiple pages using page token
item.description: I’ve been playing around with the YouTube API to analyse comments on YouTube videos and needed to use pagination to get all the comments. In this blog post, we’ll learn how to do that. But before we do anything, you’ll need to go to console.developers.google.com, create a project and enable YouTube Data API v3. Figure 1. YouTube Data API Once you’ve done that, create an API key. Figure 2. Creating an API key Create an environment variable that contains your API key:
